DESCRIPTION: Green dice make ALL enemies lose #b1-6 #yStrength this turn and #yExhaust.
Whenever you roll #yDice, roll extra times and take the highest roll.
Whenever you play a #yMarked card, draw a card and gain [E] .
When an enemy has more #yCrippling #yDebt than HP, it dies. Increases by #b25% at the start of each turn.
If you have a certain number of #yPoker #yChips in hand, discard them for an extra effect. Chips are spent from left to right.
When attacked, draw a card and reduce this by #b1.
Whenever a #yPoker #yChip is drawn, draw a card. #yPoker #yChips can be spent for extra effects and can't be upgraded.
When this card is created, the color of #yPoker #yChip it adds into your hand is randomly chosen. Different cards have different probabilities for each color of chip.
This effect is removed after you play this card.
